Reviews.Title: “Amazing! Great, friendly staff, very clean & new and perfect location quiet and close to central station”
Reviews.Author: Patty L
Reviews.Content: loved hotel central 15 minute walk central station town front nice enchanting park busy dirty crowded red light district close visit clean staff helpful remote control properly replaced luggage safely stored waiting check shared bathrooms clean kept busy engaged theres 2 4 floor downfall coffee shop 2 clubs downstairs specially weekends noisy 4th floor prices extremely cheap central amsterdam breakfast simple nice

Reviews.Title: “beware the stairs”
Reviews.Author: sj183
Reviews.Content: stayed nights january 2012 nice clean stay location alot attractions walking distance breakfast bar left door pleasent ordinary perfect set day limitations didnt plans spent days walking taking scenery doing bit shopping zoo family travelling amsterdams kept secret lots tram stop road travel little stayed fourth floor overlooking square lovely view close window night due noise clubs below days walk fell asleep pretty easily bathrooms shared wait clean fresh nightlife probably isnt stay especially light sleeper stairs fairly steep forever night amsterdam due nature buildings recommend using central station airport travel easy cheap taxi hotel 45euro little scary bikes trams braved walked 10min walk station paid 8euros airport actually aiport takes 15mins easier safer overall recommend hotel clean kept prime location aware little downfalls

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: pooce666
Reviews.Content: fiance stayed 5 nights sept 2010 read reviews looking loads hotels finally booking hotels amsterdam similar reviews complaining steep stairs noise yes slightly detrimental hotel recently redecorated perfectly formed slightly concerned shared bathrooms 2 floor servicing 5 toilet shower cubicle sink regularly cleaned sharing reasonabley considerate leaving tidy stairs steep flight arent bad 2nd floor 3rd start curse day rembrandt square location busy lots mean noisey night life day coffeeshops shouldnt issue 10 minute walk dam light 20 mins brisk walk train station oh breakfast bad tea coffee orange juice toast cheese bread ham boiled eggs etc overall hotel location pretty value money qualms staying
